person.persName: Charles Helton (Pike County, Kentucky, soldier and criminal.)

body.p: Pike County, Kentucky, soldier. Virginia native. Son of Jefferson Helton and Elizabeth Helton. Married to Elizabeth Sweney Helton in Pike County, Kentucky, on April 15. 1855. Father of Mary A. Helton and Louisa Helton. Laborer in Russell County, Virginia, in 1850. Resident of Pike County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 39th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a second lieutenant from February 16, 1863 until October 20, 1864. Convicted of assault and battery with intent to commit rape, and conduct unbecoming an officer and a gentleman. Sentenced to three years hard labor. Dishonorably discharged December 2, 1865.
